events.name: TANA National Convention Dallas 2026
events.description: Flagship Telugu diaspora gathering with leadership forums, AI and startup tracks, classical performances, youth coding challenges, and community seva drives.

events.name: ATA Global Telugu Summit San Jose 2026
events.description: A global Telugu-forward summit focused on AI careers, founder networking, women leadership, film music nights, food festivals, and mentoring for second-generation youth.

events.name: NATS East Coast Telugu Meet 2026
events.venue: New Jersey Convention and Exposition Center
events.description: East Coast Telugu families gather for health camps, diaspora business networking, devotional music, and youth public speaking competitions.

events.name: Telugu Innovation Forum Queens 2026
events.description: One-day innovation forum spotlighting Telugu founders, AI product demos, and immigrant career acceleration workshops.

events.name: NoVA Telugu Family Fest 2026
events.description: Community-led Telugu family festival with regional food stalls, dance competitions, matrimony introductions, and charity fundraising.

events.name: Chicago Telugu Tech and Culture Conclave 2026
events.description: Blends cloud engineering sessions, youth coding camps, and Telugu literary-cultural showcases with volunteering opportunities.

events.name: Atlanta Telugu Entrepreneurs Forum 2026
events.description: Founder-focused Telugu event featuring startup pitches, SMB AI adoption clinics, and community investor networking.

events.name: Florida Telugu Sunshine Utsavam 2026
events.description: A sunshine-themed Telugu utsavam with food festival lanes, cinema music medleys, and family-friendly kids zones.

events.name: Seattle Telugu AI Builders Day 2026
events.description: Hands-on day for Telugu engineers exploring LLM systems, cloud-native AI deployments, and career growth tracks.

events.name: Arizona Telugu Sahiti Sammelanam 2026
events.description: Celebrates Telugu literature, poetry, and theater while connecting local families and volunteers.

events.name: Carolina Telugu Youth Leadership Camp 2026
events.description: Leadership and STEM camp for Telugu youth featuring debates, design thinking labs, and mentor circles.

events.name: New England Telugu Community Connect 2026
events.description: Community connect for Telugu professionals and families with education counseling, career fair booths, and seva initiatives.

events.name: Pennsylvania Telugu Business Mela 2026
events.description: Business mela connecting Telugu small business owners, franchise experts, and community investors with cultural performances.

events.name: Michigan Telugu Winter Cultural Gala 2026
events.description: Winter gala with Kuchipudi/Bharatanatyam showcases, festive food counters, and charity drives supporting education back home.
